Instruction: In a saucepan, combine pitted sour cherries, chicken or beef broth, red wine, and sugar.
Place the saucepan over medium heat and bring the mixture to a simmer.
In a small bowl, mix cornstarch with water until smooth to create a slurry.
Slowly pour the cornstarch slurry into the simmering cherry mixture, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook the sauce, stirring frequently, until it thickens to your desired consistency.
Season the sour cherry sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
Remove the saucepan from heat and serve the sauce alongside grilled or roasted meats.
